long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows the use of animated emotes in Youtube live chats.
Streamers can upload animated emotes as GIF files via a dashboard at "build.brainyxs.com/bbtv".
By using the specified EmoteName in live chat, the emote is displayed animated. Every user of the extension has the opportunity to see these emotes.
If the live chat is opened via Youtube-Studio, it is automatically given a green background. In OBS, this can then be removed using a color key and the chat is displayed in the stream with the animated emotes. This means that users without the extension can also enjoy the emotes in the stream
